mapper.sql: OPERATION_ID AS operationId, OPERATOR_ID AS operatorId, DEPARTURE_ID AS departureId, OPERATION_TIME AS operationTime
mapper.select:
select a.OPERATION_ID,a.OPERATOR_ID,b.STAFF_NAME,a.DEPARTURE_ID,c.STAFF_NAME,a.OPERATION_TIME from t_departure_log a,t_staff b,t_staff c
a.OPERATOR_ID = b.STAFF_ID and a.DEPARTURE_ID = c.STAFF_ID
and a.OPERATION_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition1}),"%")
and( b.STAFF_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{condition2}),"%") or a.OPERATOR_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition2}),"%"))
and( c.STAFF_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{condition3}),"%") or a.DEPARTURE_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition3}),"%"))

select a.OPERATION_ID,a.OPERATOR_ID,b.STAFF_NAME,a.DEPARTURE_ID,c.STAFF_NAME,a.OPERATION_TIME from t_departure_log a,t_staff b,t_staff c
a.OPERATOR_ID = b.STAFF_ID and a.DEPARTURE_ID = c.STAFF_ID
and a.OPERATION_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition1}),"%")
and( b.STAFF_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{condition2}),"%") or a.OPERATOR_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition2}),"%"))
and( c.STAFF_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{condition3}),"%") or a.DEPARTURE_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition3}),"%"))
